name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Tonight was the finals of the Scripps National Spelling Bee. The finals were broadcast on ESPN. You'd think something like this would be on The Learning Channel.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Then again, you'd think The Learning Channel wouldn't show "Honey Boo Boo."

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Now that there's spell-check, some people think spelling is of little use. It's one of those skills that's become obsolete, like repairing steam engines or hosting a broadcast talk show.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: The winner of the spelling bee gets $30,000 in cash. I can't imagine what I'd have spent that kind of money on when I was 14.
